Your Screen Is Not Dead http://www.yourscreenisnotdead.com en-us ℗ & © , Jeffrey Herrera Three passionate Uptown, NYC friends break down their favorite films from current releases to older classics. No film is off-limits, no matter how obscure. Every week we announce a new film and give you a week to watch it...then we talk about it.
